thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Sunny Narula

author: Sunny Narula
title: Sunny Narula
text:
It was so easy for me to put up the task of needed completed. Got the ad up within matter of minutes and was getting offers within the hour. Only thing that would be good if we could counteroffer when a Tasker sends us one.
Besides that ... can get pretty much anything done through Airtasker. Felt safe getting it done and my Tasker was super friendly and very helpful. Hoping the rest of my experiences are just as good.
